top_comments.comment: Want THREE (3) Masters booster boxes (2015, 2017, and Ultimate)? It's the Triple Masters giveaway! Just donate in multiples of $4.00 to Trans Lifeline below and I will send one donor ALL THREE boxes on Oct 30 at 6pm PST! I'll mail worldwide! But there's also 45 additional MTG prizes going out to 45 additional donors! You can see the full list here: https://twitter.com/TolarianCollege/status/1454226004130426884?s=20 and you just need to donate in $4 multiples. Each $4 is another chance to get a cool prize! Donate---> https://secure.givelively.org/donate/trans-lifeline/tolarian-community-college-1
That was unexpectedly hilarious. Thank you so much for making my day a little bit brighter!

comments_since_last_sample.body: I love these sketches so much
I mean, he is right about a lot
horsemanship is still kicker, your opponent just has to pay extra to summon another creature with horsemanship
Has this been a longstanding joke I missed? Because nothing could be more true. Holy crap everything is just Kicker.
First strike, haste, etc aren't addressed. They should atleast be addressed. Since the connection isn't obvious, if there is one.

Empty the Warrens (3R)
Sorcery
Multikicker {cast another spell}
Create a number of 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens equal to two more than twice the number of times CARDNAME was kicked.
Everything about this short, I loved. From the people, to the ridiculousness. Also... is banding horsemanship?
yes because wizards is creatively bankrupt.
Clairty is a SOB !!! With kicker of coursre .....
J U S T K I C K E R.
Hello prof. I recently got the Spectrum Prism deck box. I think it's pretty good. What are your thought?
Pouncing Kavu was always a big favourite of mine in high school. It actually won me games. Yes, games.
That was unexpectedly hilarious. Thank you so much for making my day a little bit brighter!
